channel.title: References and Journals on Tools for Academic Research
channel.description: Recent content in References and Journals on Tools for Academic Research

item.title: WizdomAI
item.description: Understand the journals and institutes through publications

item.title: Scrapbox
item.description: A knowledge base that lets you capture notes, code, and research lightning-fast. Everything adds to a web of ideas thatâ€™s easy to use at scale.

item.title: Connected Papers
item.description: Explore connected papers in a visual graph

item.title: Responsible Journals
item.description: Understand how the journals deal with submissions and how reviews are done

item.title: RAx - Your Personal Smart Research Assistant
item.description: Speed up literature analysis and comprehension with RAx. Smart assistant to explore, collate insights and organize your research easily.

item.title: Semantic Scholar
item.description: Semantic Scholar uses groundbreaking AI and engineering to understand the semantics of scientific literature to help Scholars discover relevant research.

item.title: AMiner
item.description: AI Powered Research Career: rankings of researchers, academic institutes, and conferences; trends of research topics; datasets for research.

item.title: Whimsical
item.description: Visual workspace, online tool for quick diagrams

item.title: Unpaywall
item.description: An open database of free scholarly articles for you to legally download research papers for free.

item.title: Scholarpedia
item.description: the peer-reviewed open-access encyclopedia, where knowledge is curated by communities of experts.

item.title: Zotero
item.description: An open source bibliography reference manager with syncing and BibTeX support.

item.title: Mendeley
item.description: A bibliography reference manager with cloud storage and BibTeX support.

item.title: Readcube/Papers
item.description: A all platform app for reference mamagement, note-taking, and more. The former Papers has been rebanded as ReadCube Papers.

item.title: OSF: Open Science Framework
item.description: OSF is a free, open platform to support your research and enable collaboration.

item.title: ORCID
item.description: A unique ID for researchers

item.title: Duecredit
item.description: duecredit is being conceived to address the problem of inadequate citation of scientific software and methods, and limited visibility of donation requests for open-source software.

item.title: Protocols Io
item.description: Create, share, and collaborate on protocals. Protocals.io is not only for biologist, it can be used for any protocals.

item.title: Iris AI
item.description: Speed up literature review

item.title: Arxiv Sanity
item.description: Web interface for browsing, search and filtering recent arxiv submissions

item.title: Scirate
item.description: free and open access scientific collaboration network

item.title: Paperscape
item.description: Paperscape is an interactive map that visualises the arXiv, an open, online repository for scientific research papers.
